description:
本文朗读配乐：@frank猴猴

Are you average when it comes to mental strength or has putting in some effort made you more resilient than most? You can read on for a taster of 10 signs of mental strength to watch out for if you're looking to monitor your progress and celebrate your newfound resilience.你的内心状态是否总是平稳淡定的呢？你是否正花功夫让自己的情绪恢复力更强？阅读下面10大精神意志坚强的表现，如果你在观察自己的进步，那么就为自己的新发现庆贺吧。

1. You balance emotion and logic1.你能平衡感性思维与逻辑思维

You can't make good decisions without some emotion, but you can't make good decisions with too much emotion either. The truly resilient strike the right balance.没有感性思维，你无法做出好的决定，但如果你的感性思维过于泛滥，也会阻碍你做出正确的选择。真正的情绪平稳是适当的平衡。

2. You feel confident you can adapt to change 2.对自己的适应能力充满自信

Change is a constant. That reality doesn't stress out the truly mentally strong.变化是常常有的，但只要内心强大就不会被现实打败。

3. You face your fears 3.你能直面恐惧

Everyone has fears and not every one of them needs to be conquered, but the very resilient among us strive to face the fears that hold them back.每个人都有自己害怕的东西，并且不是每一件都得去克服，但我们内心的重要恢复力就在于不竭面对那些让自己却步的恐惧。

4. You learn from your mistakes.4.你能从错误中吸取经验

Don't justify them. Don't hide from them. Learn from them. That's what mentally strong people do.别为犯错找借口，也不要隐瞒错误。从错误中学习。那就是内心强大的人会做的事情。

5. You balance self-acceptance with self-improvement5.你能平衡自我完善与自我提高

Mentally strong people accept themselves for who they are, while simultaneously recognizing their need for personal development.内心强大的人能接受自己，同时也能了解个人发展的需求。

6. You celebrate others' success6.你能为他人的成功喝彩

If you truly feel strong, there's nothing to fear when others do well--in fact, there's a great reason to celebrate. The truly mentally strong don't feel as though other people's success somehow diminishes their own achievements. So if you sense your feelings of envy are diminishing, take it as a good sign that your resilience is improving.如果你真的感受到内心的强大力量，那么在别人成功的时候也没有什么值得担忧的——实际上，这也是很值得庆贺的理由。真正的内心强大不会因他人的成功而感到对自己成就的削弱。所以当你感到自己的嫉妒感越来越少，那就可以确定自己正在不断地增强心智。

7. You live according to your values7.你能遵循自己的价值观生活

Mentally strong people make decisions with relative ease because they understand their priorities and they live according to their values.内心强大的人相当容易就能做出决定，因为他们能分清轻重缓急，并遵循自己的价值观生活。

8. You don't need to achieve to feel good about yourself8.你不必努力争取自我满足

It's natural to feel good when you succeed and bad when you fail, but the mentally strong don't let the ups and downs of life interfere with their essential self-image. Next time life deals you a blow, then, notice how deeply it affects you. If you can shrug it off more easily without feeling too bad about yourself, congratulations! You've likely achieved a high measure of mental strength.成功时喜悦，失败时悲伤是人之常情，但内心强大的人不会让这些生活的起伏影响基本的自我形象。所以下次当你感到很糟糕的时候，那就留意一下这些情绪对你影响的程度有多深。如果你能毫无顾忌地把它抛之脑后，那么恭喜你！你已经达到了很高程度的内心强大了。

9. You express gratitude9.你会表达感恩之情

It's easy to look around and see all the things you lack, but the mentally strong choose to focus their attention on the things they do have--and feel grateful for them. Do you?环顾四周，自己缺少的东西一目了然。但内心强大的人会选择专注于当下真实拥有的东西，并以此表现感恩。你是不是也这样呢？

10. You don't try to hide your weaknesses10.你不会试图掩盖自己的弱点

Not only does trying to mask your weaknesses waste your energy, it also makes you less likely to put in the work necessary to improve these areas.不仅在掩盖弱点的过程会削弱自己的力量，还会减少实现自我完善的努力。

How many of these 10 behaviors do you exhibit?那么，这10大内心强大的特质中，你拥有了多少呢？
